rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 20 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Enhanced Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 2:00 AM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



ORANGE WARNING LEVEL: Metro Manila, Rizal, Bataan, Bulacan, Zambales and Pampanga.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING is still THREATENING.



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Cavite, Batangas, Laguna, Quezon and Tarlac.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Nueva Ecija which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 5:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
